column2: Schwartzentruber J, Buhas D, Majewski J, Sasarman F, Papillon-Cavanagh S, Thiffault I, Sheldon KM, Massicotte C, Patry L, Simon M, Zare AS, McKernan KJ: FORGE Canada Consortium, Michaud J, Boles RG, Deal CL, Desilets V, Shoubridge EA, Samuels ME. Mutation in the nuclear-encoded mitochondrial isoleucyl-tRNA synthetase IARS2 in patients with cataracts, growth hormone deficiency with short stature, partial sensorineural deafness, and peripheral neuropathy or with Leigh syndrome.
